options: Option 1: It has a planar structure
Option 2: All carbon atoms are sp² hybridized

text: Question 23: Which of the following statements is/are correct about the periodic table?
options: Option 1: Atomic radius increases down a group
Option 2: Ionization energy decreases down a group
Option 3: Electronegativity increases across a period
Option 4: Metallic character decreases across a period

text: Question 24: Which of the following statements is/are correct about chemical equilibrium?
options: Option 1: The equilibrium constant depends on temperature
Option 2: Addition of a catalyst changes the equilibrium constant
Option 3: The equilibrium shifts in the forward direction when concentration of products is decreased
Option 4: The equilibrium constant is independent of pressure for reactions involving gases
